backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing video management (CRUD with YouTube URL validation, genre support, and admin-only access) and user profile management with role-based authorization using AccessControl and MixinAuthorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two completed features: removal of logo box from SplashView and TopNav components, with associated test IDs and component dependencies.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend source files including components, hooks, utilities, and configuration files for the Netflix-style streaming application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining light and dark theme variables for a cinematic dark theme with custom sidebar, chart, and destructive color tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with viewport meta tag, title "TV Streaming Network", and root div mounting the React application from main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component managing view state (splash/home/manage), session-based splash dismissal, admin access control with toast notifications, and conditional TopNav rendering with footer.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminAuthCo: Admin authentication controls displaying "Admin Sign In" button or "Clear Admin Access" based on admin status, with dialog trigger and success callback for post-authentication navigation.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminTokenD: Modal dialog for admin authentication that validates admin code input, displays clear error messages for invalid codes, and triggers success callback only after confirming admin status is true.
frontend/src/components/auth/UserAuthBut: User authentication button handling Internet Identity sign-in/sign-out with loading states and query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/home/Hero.tsx: Hero section component with background image, gradient overlays, and a call-to-action button that triggers the onExplore callback to scroll to video content.
frontend/src/components/home/HomeView.ts: Main home view that displays the hero section and organizes videos into rows by category (Originals, Comedy, Drama, Documentary) with loading states and error handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopNav.ts: Sticky top navigation bar with Home/Manage navigation buttons, user authentication controls, and admin authentication controls that conditionally render based on admin status.
frontend/src/components/manage/ManageVid: Admin-only video management dashboard that checks admin permissions and displays a list of videos with add/edit/delete functionality, showing access denied for non-admin users.
frontend/src/components/manage/VideoForm: Form component for creating and editing videos with fields for title, description, YouTube URL, genre, and original status, including URL validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/manage/VideoList: List item component displaying video thumbnail and metadata with edit/delete action buttons and a confirmation dialog for deletion.
frontend/src/components/splash/SplashVie: Full-screen splash screen with animated background elements, large title, and an enter button that triggers the onContinue callback.
frontend/src/components/videos/VideoCard: Video card component displaying thumbnail with hover effects and play button overlay that opens a video player dialog on click.
frontend/src/components/videos/VideoPlay: Modal dialog component that embeds a YouTube video player with autoplay using the video's YouTube ID and displays title and description.
Displays a horizontal scrollable row of video cards with a title and left/right navigation buttons that appear on hover.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance with authentication, initializing access control with admin token from URL params and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Provides a hook to check if the current user has admin privileges by calling the backend actor's isCallerAdmin method.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminToken.ts: Manages admin token application and removal, storing tokens in sessionStorage and triggering actor/admin state re-evaluation through query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useVideos.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching videos and original shows, plus mutations for creating, updating, and deleting videos with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark theme colors and a utility class to hide scrollbars.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting URL parameters from query strings or hash-based routing, managing sessionStorage persistence, and clearing sensitive parameters from URLs.
frontend/src/utils/youtube.ts: Parses YouTube URLs (watch, youtu.be, embed formats) to extract video IDs and generates thumbnail URLs with configurable quality levels.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration file that defines custom theme extensions including OKLCH color system, custom fonts (Inter, Outfit), animations (accordion, fade-in), and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata tracking completed features for removing logo box displays from SplashView and App components, with one pending feature request (AR-1) for the same logo removal task.
